summary: This mod replaces various static containers with containerised versions that use the original models
descriptionHtml:
This mod consists of 3 .esp\'s to replace Crates, Casks & Barrels, Woodpiles with containers that look identical to the originals.
All new containers are fully populated by levelled lists and are set to NOT respawn, rendering them safe for long-term storage.

S2C-Crates	Replaces 3040 crates in the game (all of them except the 100 snow covered ones)

S2C-Casks	Replaces the large casks (114), small mead barrels (914) and the dark wooden barrels (2748, again not the snow covered ones).

S2C-Woodpiles	Replaces all sizes of woodpiles (1139 of them) with containers containg random quantities of wood so you need never chop wood again :)

Note: Where containers exist in owned areas e.g. Dragonsreach, the new containers inherit the ownership of the parent cell.

Important note - these mods are NOT compatible with existing game characters as any save game will contain references to the static objects that I have replaced.  So use with NEW CHARACTERS ONLY.  I have played a NEW character up to level 34 with no noticeable problems.

I know of 2 mods that replace casks & barrels, this is why I created 3 separate files, so you can pick and choose.

S2C-All		This file combines the above three mods into one.  Use this file OR the seperate versions if you want some flexability, NOT BOTH.

Note: The combined version is a re-creation of the work I did for the 3 seperated versions rather than a merge so there may be some slight variation with the levelled lists.

Installation - Download with NMM.
Manual Installation - Put the files in your Skyrim\\Data directory

Un-Installation - Delete all files prefixed with S2C (Up to 5 Files including this Readme, depending on version)

Revisions
1.0	Initial Version.
1.1	Added all in one version & Readme.
author: flobalob
